Blackfang took a deep breath. He had been told of Airrazor, the cousin 
he never knew, and he never forgave Megatron for having killed her so 
coldly.

Blackfang: It's a long story. To make it short, let's say that 
Megatron and his maniacal ego wanted to gather energon here, but they 
ended up finding out this was Earth. You see, predacons aren't quite 
dominant on Cybertron, but a lot of them are working on this.

> Nightlight::

> "That's horrible..."said Nightlight "why did this fight began?'"
